com.btilm305.clashapi

Interface AbbreviatedClan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClanData
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Clan

    public interface AbbreviatedClan
extends ClanData
    A representation of a clan containing data returned by most API calls. Includes most of the information about a clan.

    More information about a clan can be requested with ClashAPI.requestClan(ClanData)

    • Method Summary
